extendedInfo.description: âCar Maintenance Reminder Proâ is an all-in-one car application that helps you to: (1). Keep track of mileage, fuel efficiency and cost; (2). Log services, and get maintenance reminder when a due date approaches. For the fuel logging function, the application automatically generates useful statistics about MPG, gas price, driving distance per day, volume per fill up, cost per day etc. It also provides TEN graphical charts (2.0.1 and up) for detailed and clear reports of your carâs mileage, fuel economy, costs etc.For the maintenance reminder function, the application provides comprehensive logging and reminders for almost all regular car services based on both mileage and dates, such as oil change, tire rotation, wheel alignment, air filter change, coolant flush, transmission fluid change, brake pad change, timing belt replacement, annual inspection and spark plug replacement. Even more, you can create your own customized service reminders, log costs, and write notes about your cars, such as part number, state registration, appointment time, mechanic shop phone number etc. With just a glance at your phone, you will have all the service records at hand! Notifications at status bar will automatically show up to remind you when a service is due within a week, or 200 miles, so that you will never miss a needed maintenance. You can manage multiple cars in the application (Pro only), export data to external SD card and restore the saved data. You can also create a CSV report containing all service reminders, full maintenance history and gas fill up records. The app can also email the CSV to your E-mail so that you can open the report from your computer using Excel!We made the application very flexible to suite all kinds of needs: You can use the app for your cars, or your motorcycles; Multiple units are supported (km/mi, US gal/UK gal/liter); You can choose your own currency symbol or date format; You can arrange the order of maintenance depending on their importance, customize the application to only show information you care about, and choose reminders you want to get; You can also customize the frequency of reminders showing in the status bar. With the application, you can keep track of everything about your cars, save money, extend their life, and have a safer car!Key features include:-	Add multiple vehicles to your application (the Lite version supports only one vehicle);-	Data backup (both Lite and Pro) and restore (Pro only);-	Save data in CSV format, and E-mail your CSV file to yourself (Pro only);-	Keep fuel fill up records;-	Statistics about MPG, mileage, gas price etc;-	10 useful plots showing detailed records of fuel consumption, mileage etc (2.0.1 and up);-	Calculate the maintenance due date based on both date and mileage;-	Keep track of the service date for tire rotation, engine/cabin air filter change, windshield wiper change, change of transmission/brake/steering fluid, radiator coolant flush, spark plug replacement, wheel alignment, brake pad change, timing belt change and battery change and annual state inspection;-	Unlimited number of customizable reminders;-	A note section to log anything else about the car;-	Support multiple units/currency/date format;-	Set your own frequency of maintenance schedule;-	Customize the display and reminders;-	Graphical and quantitative representation of maintenance schedule;-	Easy update of the date and mileage;-	Reminder at the status bar when a due date is within 7 days, or mileage left is less than 200 miles/km;-	Vehicles are identified by a logo of the make (more than 50 makes supported, including most of US and European cars).-	Support moving of the application to SD;EXCLUSIVE features for the Pro version:-	Add unlimited number of cars;-	Restore saved data from SD card;-	Backup to CSV and email the CSV file to your E-mail;-	No advertisement/popup and no data usage.For more info, please visit the developerâs website: http://www.cooloy.com.

reviews.title: What happened??
reviews.comment: This app used to be the greatest but within the past two months it has deleted my fiancees vehicle and uninstalled itself somehow.. Idk if it was the update or what but it sucks now. Please fix
reviews.author: Bradley Moody

reviews.title: Cant backup to sd card
reviews.comment: I am trying to get support on the above issue. I have a new Samsung S4 and since I installed the your restored the program and restored the data the program will not back up to the sd card. Bnutting63@gmail.com
reviews.author: Bruce Nutting

reviews.title: Maintenance Pro
reviews.comment: Great app it is always with me does what I need have had no problems
reviews.author: Dean Lambertson

reviews.title: Good way to keep track of vehicle maintenance records.
reviews.comment: Be sure to save your back up files. The auto-restore feature does not work as advertised.,
reviews.author: Austin Eib

reviews.title: App is good, Support SUCKS!
reviews.comment: I have been using this (paid version) app for a couple of years. It\'s perfect for what I need it for. It helps keep track of all my maintenance. I set it to automatically back up to SD card and Google. Which I just found out, the hard way that it didn\'t back up to the SD card properly AND if it did in the cloud, it won\'t restore it from there. So I lost 2-3 years worth of data! When I try to contact the developer, I get no reply. If they reply, I can give 5 stars..
reviews.author: Al Sharp

reviews.title: NO SUPPORT!!!
reviews.comment: The app is good but I\'ve tried to get support for months. No reply. This apply cannot multitask. Don\'t bother to buy this.
reviews.author: Jerome Hernandez

reviews.title: Great app!!!
reviews.comment: I start filling out while filling up and sometimes lose info if the screen locks...can you fix?  Otherwise, awesome!
reviews.author: Erik Zentmyer

reviews.title: Great App.
reviews.comment: Been using for a couple of Month\'s now. I like how U can add info to your needs. Give a 100%
reviews.author: E LO

reviews.title: Absolutely NO support from the Dev!
reviews.comment: I have tried to contact the dev several times with no success.  It continually force closes on my Galaxy Note 2.   Waste of money.   Try aCar (Zonewalker)  for a much better automotive maintenance tool.
reviews.author: Ralph Gonzalez

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: A few minor glitches and UI issues, but overall, an excellent app for keeping maintenance records, maintenance reminders, and fuel economy logs.
reviews.author: Adrian Price

reviews.title: vehicles maintenance
reviews.comment: It would nice if one could pick his selection of what to track on the motorcycle is little different then the needs for maintenance on the car thank Ronald S. Butler
reviews.author: Ronald Butler

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I\'ve just started using the app and feel that the current odometer reading should be updated when ever we input a gas log or maintenance log into the system.
reviews.author: David Lisle

reviews.title: Perfect, pay for pro.
reviews.comment: Aside from the fact that it\'s worth it, the developer earned my cash.
reviews.author: kristian brasel

reviews.title: Excellent, flexible app
reviews.comment: This is a well designed and thought-out app.  It has all the features you need to track vehicle maintenance.  You can create your own maintenance items and even edit the interval on the preloaded items.  Great job, Cooloy.
reviews.author: Peter Taylor

reviews.title: Used to be a good app...
reviews.comment: Developer quit responding to emails and apparently quit supporting the app. I\'m unable to restore my database. Don\'t buy until these issues are addressed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very useful and handy especially being able to make custom reminders. Would be nice to sink with other devices thou.
reviews.author: Christopher Hart

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: No response in multiple (paid version) updates has caused me to drop a star.  Feb \'13: Would be great if a user could assign Kilometers per hour (Km/h) to a specific vehicle instead of having to apply to all. I also use this app for my boat and tractor and I would like to use \"hours\".
reviews.author: R Stone

reviews.title: No support
reviews.comment: I tried to move all my data from my old S2 to my new S4 using the SD card,  then the cloud. The old phone will NOT save the data. Cooloy has no responses: check their website before you buy this.
reviews.author: Cliff Greenberg

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.comment: I used the lite version for six months and was very satisfied with it. That being said the added features ate so worth the couple of bucks for this application.
reviews.author: Ben Taylor

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Excellent customer service.  Thanks
reviews.author: Eliezer Partidas
